title: Drawing, Design for an Art Deco Arched Storefront, ca. 1925
title_raw: Design for an Art Deco Arched Storefront
medium: Brush and gray wash, white gouache, beige gouache, graphite on gray paperboard
markings: At lower right, small [1/2 x 1 in.] Kilemnik stamp in black(top):  KILEMNIK & Cia/524 FLORIDA;  small [1/2 x 1 in.] copyright stamp in black (bottom): LEY  7092/9510/DE PROTECCION/ A LA/PROPIEDAD/ARTISTICA
description: Perspective view of deep arched entrance lined with vitrines.  The shop entrance area adjoins a  larger rectangular space with ceiling and upper wall decorated with a repeating grooved/coved  pattern. The grooved patterns ends at a wrought iron double door.  Outlines of two female pedestrians stand to the left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for an Art Deco Arched Storefront, ca. 1925. Brush and gray wash, white gouache, beige gouache, graphite on gray paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-17.
